ValidationRule.description: When the Provider Trainee Type is ‘Other medical trainee’, the user must specify the Number of Years In Practice (Number_of_Years). Can be bypassed if Bypass_Validations_Timeout__c > now and the Bypass field is not blank.
ValidationRule.errorConditionFormula: AND( NOT(Incomplete_Submission__c), OR(Bypass_Validations_Timeout__c <= NOW(), ISBLANK(Bypass_Validations_Timeout__c)), ISPICKVAL(Trainee_Type__c, 'Other medical trainee'), ISBLANK(Number_of_Years_In_Practice__c) )
ValidationRule.errorMessage: Please specify the Number of Years In Practice when ‘Trainee Type’ is ‘Other medical trainee’.
